name: OR_CASE_ALL_SURG
description: The OR_CASE_ALL_SURG table contains OR management system case surgeons.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the lines of the surgeon within the case.

columns.name: SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value which indicates the surgical service of the surgeon.
